Event: A lonely, isolating, hopeless, regretful, shameful, heart-breaking, suicide-inducing experience.
Post: "Feeling like a burden to everyone, I'm trapped in a never-ending cycle of loneliness and isolation. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'life' thing."

Event: Constant expectation of bad things happening.
Post: "Another day, another disappointment. I can't seem to shake off this constant feeling of impending doom. Maybe it's just my natural pessimism, or maybe the universe really does have it out for me."

Event: feeling empty and alone despite having a job and a loving partner, struggling with existential dread and meaninglessness.
Post: "Feeling empty and alone, despite having a job and a loving partner, I can't help but wonder if this is all there is to life. Struggling with existential dread and meaninglessness, I question my own purpose and the point of it all."

Event: A lonely and boring day that left the individual feeling unmotivated and hopeless.

Event: ... getting myself out of the situation that's making me depressed.
Post: "Feeling suffocated by my own thoughts, I'm struggling to find the light at the end of this dark tunnel. Maybe it's time to take responsibility for my own happiness and stop relying on others to fix my problems."

...

The main event in the post is "I became serious with out any sign of change and now I don't care about anything." This event is significant because it marks a shift in the individual's personality and behavior, from being outgoing and charismatic to becoming detached and uninterested in things. The event may have been triggered by various factors such as suppression of one's true self due to external expectations or other traumatic events.
Post: "I used to be the life of the party, but now I can't even muster up the energy to care about anything. It's like I've lost my spark and I'm just going through the motions. I've tried to fake it, to pretend that everything is fine, but it's exhausting. Maybe it's time for me to take a step back and figure out who I really am, without all the expectations and masks. #lostmyspark #tryingtofindmyway #authenticity"

Event: Starting a WhatsApp groupchat to support and talk about daily struggles with depression.
Post: "Feeling lost in my own mind, I'm starting this WhatsApp group chat to reach out for help and support. Maybe together we can find solace in our shared struggles with depression."

Event: Losing almost all feelings and being unable to cry anymore, resulting in panic attacks.
Post: "Feeling numb and hollow, I've lost the ability to feel anything deeper than surface-level emotions. Is this what they call 'adulting'? Panic attacks are my new norm."

Event: Relapse into depression after feeling better and making positive changes in one's life.
Post: "I thought I was doing better, but here I am again, drowning in the darkness of depression. Maybe it's just who I am, maybe I'll never truly be able to escape this hell."

Event: Talking about depression with people
Post: "Despite my best efforts to hide it, my depression has been a constant companion for years. Maybe I'm just not strong enough to shake it off."

Event: struggling with depression and anxiety, feeling lost and alone in life, trying therapy but feeling impersonal and unproductive, finding support and love in a community.
Post: "Feeling lost and alone in life, I've been struggling with depression and anxiety. Despite trying therapy, it feels impersonal and unproductive. But, I'm grateful to have found support and love in a community that truly cares."

Event: feeling stuck in the same place and unsure of what one wants out of life.
Post: "Feeling stuck in the same place and unsure of what I want out of life, I can't help but wonder if it's just me or if everyone struggles with this sense of purposelessness."

Event: The individual feels unwanted and unappreciated, with thoughts of suicide present in their mind.
Post: "Feeling like a burden to everyone around me, I can't help but wonder if the world would be better off without me. The constant feeling of being unwanted and unappreciated has taken its toll on my mental health, and I can't help but feel like suicide is the only way out."

Event: got hit with overwhelming sadness for no reason
Post: "Feeling consumed by a dark cloud of sadness, I'm left questioning my own mental strength. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'life' thing."

Event: Realizing I have no sense of self can't focus while watching TV, music, or anything; I just exist.
Post: "Feeling lost and aimless, I'm left questioning my purpose. Maybe it's me, maybe I'll never have a clear direction in life. But for now, I'm stuck in this rut of simply existing."

Event: Going back to work after a break over the holidays and feeling anxious about it due to fear of not being able to perform as expected and let oneself down.
Post: "Back to work after the holidays, and my mind is racing with self-doubt. Will I still be able to deliver? Am I good enough? The pressure's on, and I can't help but wonder if I'm truly cut out for this."

Event: Panic attack and feeling worthless and depressed.
Post: "Feeling like I'm drowning in my own thoughts, another panic attack takes hold. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this life thing."

Event: When you need to get to sleep.

Event: A feeling of drainedness, depression, and boredom due to the repetitive nature of daily routines.
Post: "Feeling drained, depressed, and bored with the repetition of daily routines. Maybe it's just my lack of creativity or motivation that's sucking the life out of me."

Event: The person is scared and has a fear of self-harm or suicide.
Post: "I can't seem to shake off this dark cloud that's been following me everywhere. I'm starting to think it's just a part of who I am, and that thought alone is terrifying."
